base.helperThreads
Class EventTriggeredWriterThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      base.helperThreads.EventTriggeredWriterThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public abstract class EventTriggeredWriterThread
extends java.lang.Thread

Abstract class for a thread that writes into a port and evokes a signal to on a given Signal (for weaking up readers) at given a signal from a TimeTrigger.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Bernhard Kast
